name: Honeycomb Ice Cream
description: Rich and creamy vanilla ice cream studded with crunchy honeycomb toffee pieces. Made with fresh cream and pure honey from local apiaries.
short_description: Creamy vanilla with crunchy honeycomb toffee

name: Sicilian Pistachio
description: Authentic pistachio ice cream made with pistachios imported directly from Sicily. Naturally green with an intense nutty flavor.
short_description: Authentic Sicilian pistachios in creamy gelato

name: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
description: Dairy-free chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream made with oat milk. Chunks of edible cookie dough in every bite.
short_description: Dairy-free with chunks of cookie dough

name: Earl Grey Tea
description: Delicate Earl Grey tea-infused ice cream with hints of bergamot. A sophisticated flavor for tea lovers.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Fresh strawberry ice cream with pieces of buttery shortcake cookies throughout. Summer in every spoonful.

name: Vegan Mint Chip
description: Refreshing mint ice cream made with coconut cream and dark chocolate chips. Cool and refreshing.
short_description: Refreshing mint with dark chocolate chips

name: Salted Caramel
description: Buttery caramel ice cream with swirls of sea salt caramel sauce. The perfect balance of sweet and salty.

name: Mango Sorbet
description: Refreshing dairy-free mango sorbet made with ripe Alphonso mangoes. Light and tropical.

name: Oat Milk Brown Sugar Chunk
description: Oat milk ice cream with brown sugar swirls and chocolate chunks. Rich and indulgent without dairy.
short_description: Oat milk with brown sugar and chocolate

name: Marionberry Cheesecake
description: Oregon marionberry ice cream with chunks of real cheesecake. A Pacific Northwest favorite.

name: Vegan Peanut Butter Brownie
description: Peanut butter ice cream made with cashew milk and loaded with fudgy brownie pieces.
short_description: Peanut butter with fudgy brownie pieces

name: Passion Fruit Sorbet
description: Tangy and tropical passion fruit sorbet. Dairy-free and bursting with exotic flavor.
